title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

It's a national holiday and nobody told Rush. Democrats locking down, using Capitol Hill protests as excuses for everything. Democrats who tell us walls don't work, erect walls around themselves. New caravan on way from Honduras, Biden administration tells them now's not the time to come. Democrats lock down country for Biden inauguration to paint peaceful Trump supporters as dangerous. Violent, mass-scale demonstrations took place in 2016 for Trump's inaugural, were cheered by press, beginning of campaign to delegitimize Trump, turn county against him. Inauguration rehearsal evacuated after fire in homeless encampment blocks away. Democrats speculate that 90% white national guard could be part of insurrection against Biden. Washington surrounded by armed troops and razor wire to install Democrat president. Why is it necessary if America loves Biden? Bird Box movie extrapolation: Democrats don't want you to see the truth. Biden team wants to raise suspicions about National Guard, Secret Service. Pandemic lockdown allowed Dems to impose regulations, Biden win and Democrat wins in Georgia broke the dam, massive liberalism to follow. Democrats don't share our goals, want to tear down Trump policies that worked. AOC wants to reprogram conservatives. Democrats in blue states want to open up now that Trump is gone. Flashback to ABC coverage of riots at Trump inaugural. F. Chuck Todd laments Trump approval unchanged, failure to separate Trump from his supporters.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Biden team questioning the loyalty of the National Guard, Secret Service. Piece on Joe Biden's dreams. Media's focus on Trump supporters as "white supremacists" is disgusting, untrue. AOC: It's going to take a long time and money to de-radicalize Trump supporters. Dem Rep. Steve Cohen: National Guard is 90% male, could be large segment of Trump sympathizers at Biden inaugural. Fran Townsend: We have to root out extremists in law enforcement. Caller says GOP must dump Trump and unite. Ned Ryun on GOP, Trump supporters, Dem hypocrisy. CNN: Trump to issue 100 pardons.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Pennsylvania Lt. Governor says that saying the election was rigged shouldn't be protected as free speech. What did Democrats do for four years with the Russia hoax? Former Facebook security chief says Newsmax, OAN should be de-platformed by cable companies. Dr. King wouldn't recognize the modern Democrat Party and all the things being done in his name. Charles Barkley says professional athletes should get the COVID vaccine first because of taxes they pay. Vet on military presence in Capitol, questioning of loyalty of National Guard. Book publishers want to keep Trump from publishing a memoir for putting kids in cages and backing a coup. Rush thanks everyone for their prayers. Donald Trump was a man alone when he took on the Washington Establishment. Obama gets book deals, Netflix deals despite putting kids in cages, backing a coup and doing nothing while American troops died in Benghazi. Patrick Mahomes' mom on his concussion. Caller thanks Rush for homeschooling his kids on the radio.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
